parameters.name: DbscId
parameters.description: The ID of the dedicated block storage cluster.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description:
The maximum number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: 500.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The query token. Set the value to the NextToken value returned in the previous call to the DescribeDedicatedBlockStorageClusterDisks operation. Leave this parameter empty the first time you call this operation.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the dedicated block storage cluster resides. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
